article: A Guide to Getting Your Starbucks Partner Discount in the App
intro: As a Starbucks partner, you qualify for discounts on your favorite beverages, food items, and merchandise in any company-operated Starbucks store. To make sure you get your discount when you place orders in the mobile app and in a store, you'll need to link your partner number to your Starbucks account

steps.title: Click .
steps.subtitle: Now that your partner number is linked to your account, you'll receive your partner discount every time you place an order in the mobile app.
sub-points: If you haven't yet  to the Starbucks mobile app, you'll need to do so if you'd like to use your partner discount when paying in stores and/or earn rewards on your mobile purchases.

steps.title: Make your partner card your default payment in stores (optional).
steps.subtitle: If you already had a Starbucks Rewards card linked to your mobile app, it's probably still set as your default payment method. To switch to your Partner Card, follow these steps:
sub-points: From the main screen, tap the profile icon and select .
Tap your partner card under "Manage Starbucks Cards."
Tap the switch next to "Make in store default" to turn the feature on.
